data.title: Renault designed an industrial data acquisition layer and connected it to Google Cloud
data.meta_description: French multinational automotive manufacturer Renault Group has been investing in Industry 4.0 since the early days.
data.text:
Customer Overview

Focusing on cost efficiency

Renault Group has manufactured cars since 1898. Today, it is an international group with five brands that sold close to 3 million vehicles worldwide in 2020 and provide sustainable mobility throughout the world, with 40 manufacturing sites and more than 170,000 employees.

3 million

Vehicles worldwide in 2020

170,000

Employees

40

Manufacturing sites

Tell us your challenge. We can help you get solving.

The Solution

How Renault solved scaling and cost challenges on its industrial data platform using BigQuery and Dataflow

A leader in the Industry 4.0 movement, Renault launched its digital transformation plan in 2016 to achieve greater efficiency and modernize its traditional manufacturing and industrial practices. A key objective of this transformation was using the industrial data from up to 40 sites globally to promote data-based business decisions and create new opportunities.

VIDEO

A Google Cloud and Renault Partnership

VIDEO

Fireside Chat with Renault

All started with Renault’s digital transformation

With Renault’s leadership in Industry 4.0 for manufacturing and supply chain, and with Google’s expertise in big data, analytics, and machine learning since its foundations, Google Cloud solutions were a clear match for Renault’s ambitions.

Industry Insights: Addressing the ’new normal’ in manufacturing

What does this mean for the manufacturing industry that relies so heavily on market stability and consistency? What measures can be implemented to support short-term business continuity and also ensure long-term breakthrough optimization? History tells us that the short-term measures implemented during global crises turn into fundamental social and economic shifts that last for generations.

Explore our automotive industry solutions

Technical overview

Inside Industry Data Management 4.0 at Renault

How does Renault, an iconic automobile manufacturer, work with Google Cloud to transform the future of its industry?

The 4.0 revolution

Renault teamed up with Google Cloud for an ambitious digitization of their production facilities and to quickly expand across their supply chain. Together, they accelerated Industry 4.0—a data-powered movement—and are building the factory of the future.
